name: ANSFMIN
description: Minimal value of inorganic nitrogen release from sediment (at 0 °C)

name: aver
description: Area of layer at its bottom / at its top (<= 1)
note: for 1 layer it is 0 (no layer below) / area at top = 0

name: EPSMIN
description: Light extinction coefficient for water

name: MOMIN
description: Rate of zoo mortality at 0 °C (at zoo biomass much higher than half-saturation)
note: this is value without biomanipulation	 other common are 0.005 (with biomanipulation) and 0.045 (many small fish)

name: MOT
description: Slope for zoo mortality depending on temperature
note: this is value without biomanipulation	 other common are 0.002 (with biomanipulation) and 0.018 (many small fish)

name: NDSEND
description: End day of denitrification from sediment

name: NDSSTART
description: Start day of denitrification from sediment

name: npsfmode
description: Shallow lake parameter (if 1	 p release only dependent on n)

name: nx
description: Number of phytoplankton groups

name: APSFMAX
description: Maximum value of phosphorus release from sediment (at O2 < linden)

name: APSFMIN
description: Minimum value of phosphorus release from sediment (at O2 saturation)

name: APSFT
description: Temperature correction factor for p release from sediment

name: AZMAX
description: Maximum assimilation coefficient of zoo (at minimum ingestion rate)

name: AZMIN
description: Minimum assimilation coefficient of zoo (at maximum ingestion rate)

name: DTA
description: Parameter for zoo egg development time depending on temperature

name: DTB
description: Parameter for zoo egg development time depending on temperature

name: DTC
description: Parameter for zoo egg development time depending on temperature

name: DTMIN
description: Value for zoo egg development time below which the time becomes constant

name: EPSD
description: Light extinction coefficient for detritus

name: GMAX
description: Maximum value of specific ingestion rate of zoo

name: GMIN
description: Minimum value of specific ingestion rate of zoo (near 0 °C)

name: KANSF
description: Slope for release of organic nitrogen from sediment

name: KAPSF
description: Half-saturation of O2 for phosphorus release from sediment

name: KDEN
description: Coefficient for denitrification dependence on organic matter

name: KMINER
description: Coefficient for O2 consumption by mineralization of sinking phytoplankton

name: KMO
description: Half-saturation for zoo mortality on zoo biomass

name: KNDS
description: Half-saturation of denitrification on nitrogen

name: KNDST
description: Parameter for temperature dependence of denitrification

name: KO
description: Half-saturation of O2 limitation

name: KSEZA
description: Half-saturation of O2 consumption by sediment on O2

name: KXG
description: Half-saturation of ingestion rate of zoo on food

name: KXMIN
description: Minimum of half-saturation (kx	 kxn) of inverse relationship of photosynthesis on phytoplankton biomass

name: KZMIN
description: Minimum of half-saturation (kz) of inverse relationship of ingestion rate on zoo biomass

name: LGH
description: Parameter of the dependence of half-saturation (kzi) of ingestion rate on phytoplankton biomass at high phytoplankton biomass

name: LGL
description: Parameter of the dependence of half-saturation (kzi) of ingestion rate on phytoplankton biomass at low phytoplankton biomass

name: LINDEN
description: O2 threshold below which denitrification occurs

name: LXH
description: Parameter for half-saturation of phytosynthesis on p concentration at high p concentration

name: LXHN
description: Parameter for half-saturation of phytosynthesis on n concentration at high n concentration

name: LXL
description: Parameter for half-saturation of phytosynthesis on p concentration at low p concentration

name: LXLN
description: Parameter for half-saturation of phytosynthesis on n concentration at low p concentration

name: MGH
description: Parameter for half-saturation of ingestion rate on phytoplankton biomass at high phytoplankton biomass

name: MGL
description: Parameter for half-saturation of ingestion rate on phytoplankton biomass at low phytoplankton biomass

name: MXH
description: Parameter for half-saturation of phytosynthesis on nutrient concentration at high nutrient concentration

name: MXL
description: Parameter for half-saturation of phytosynthesis on nutrient concentration at low nutrient concentration

name: NDSMAX
description: Maximum rate of denitrification

name: OPTNP
description: Optimum n/p mass ratio

name: PF
description: Preference factor for ingestion of detritus by zoo

name: R
description: Parameter of ingestion rate of zoo on water temperature

name: RAT
description: Ratio of soluble to total phosphorus in zooplankton faeces

name: RATF
description: Ratio of soluble to total phosphorus in fish excrement and during remineralization of dead zooplankton

name: RATN
description: Ratio of soluble to total nitrogen in zooplankton faeces

name: RATNF
description: Ratio of soluble to total nitrogen in fish excrements and during remineralization of dead zooplankton

name: RL
description: Factor of light reflection at the water surface

name: RLW
description: Factor of light reflection at the water surface during ice cover

name: RXMF
description: Factor of phtosynthesis rate consumed by additional respiration

name: RZMIN
description: Respiration rate of zoo at optimum temperature for feeding but without food supply

name: RZOPT
description: Respiration rate of zoo at optimum temperature for feeding and maximum ingestion rate

name: RZTMIN
description: Respiration rate of zoo near 0 °C and optimal food supply

name: SEZMAX
description: Maximum oxygen consumption by the sediment

name: SF
description: Sediment focussing factor

name: TOPTZ
description: Optimum temperature for feeding activity of zoo

name: UXZD
description: Factor of the physiological utilisation of detritus by zooplankton

name: VD
description: Net sinking velocity of detritus

name: WPKX
description: Point of inflection of half-saturation of photosynthesis on phytoplankton biomass

name: WPKZ
description: Point of inflection of half-saturation of ingestion rate on zoo biomass

name: YD
description: Phosphorus related yield coefficient of detritus

name: YND
description: Nitrogen related yield coefficient of detritus

name: YNX
description: Nitrogen related yield coefficient of phytoplankton

name: YOX
description: O2 consumed/released per gram biomass oxidized/produced

name: YZN
description: Nitrogen related yield coefficient of zooplankton

name: YZP
description: Phosphorus related yield coefficient of phytoplankton

name: EPSX1
description: Light extinction coefficient for phyto 1
note: Oscillatoria → groups need to be ordered from hardest to easiest to eat

name: EPSX2
description: Light extinction coefficient for phyto 2

name: EPSX3
description: Light extinction coefficient for phyto 3

name: KI1
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis for phyto 1 on light

name: KI2
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis for phyto 2 on light

name: KI3
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis for phyto 3 on light

name: KN1
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis for phyto 1 on n at minimum phytoplankton biomass

name: KN2
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis for phyto 2 on n at minimum phytoplankton biomass

name: KN3
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis for phyto 3 on n at minimum phytoplankton biomass

name: KP1
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis of phyto 1 on p at minimum phytoplankton biomass

name: KP2
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis of phyto 2 on p at minimum phytoplankton biomass

name: KP3
description: Half-saturation of photosynthesis of phyto 3 on p at minimum phytoplankton biomass

name: KPF1
description: Half-saturation of preference factor of zooplankton for phyto 1 on availability of other phytoplankton

name: KPF2
description: Half-saturation of preference factor of zooplankton for phyto 2 on availability of other phytoplankton

name: KPF3
description: Half-saturation of preference factor of zooplankton for phyto 3 on availability of other phytoplankton

name: NFIX1
description: N fixation factor for phyto 1

name: NFIX2
description: N fixation factor for phyto 2

name: NFIX3
description: N fixation factor for phyto 3

name: PFC1
description: Preference factor for ingestion of phyto 1 by zoo in absence of other phytoplankton

name: PFC2
description: Preference factor for ingestion of phyto 2 by zoo in absence of other phytoplankton

name: PFC3
description: Preference factor for ingestion of phyto 3 by zoo in absence of other phytoplankton
note: only this is effectively used since it is the easiest group to eat

name: PFX1
description: Threshold for biomass of other phytoplanktons above which phyto 1 ingestion rate is decreasing

name: PFX2
description: Threshold for biomass of other phytoplanktons above which phyto 3 ingestion rate is decreasing

name: PFX3
description: Threshold for biomass of other phytoplanktons above which phyto 3 ingestion rate is decreasing

name: PHOTXMAX1
description: Photosynthesis rate of phyto 1 at optimum conditions

name: PHOTXMAX2
description: Photosynthesis rate of phyto 2 at optimum conditions

name: PHOTXMAX3
description: Photosynthesis rate of phyto 3 at optimum conditions

name: PHOTXMIN1
description: Photosynthesis rate of phyto 1 at 0 °C but otherwise optimum conditions

name: PHOTXMIN2
description: Photosynthesis rate of phyto 2 at 0 °C but otherwise optimum conditions

name: PHOTXMIN3
description: Photosynthesis rate of phyto 3 at 0 °C but otherwise optimum conditions

name: RXTMIN1
description: Basis respiration of phyto 1 near 0°

name: RXTMIN2
description: Basis respiration of phyto 2 near 0°

name: RXTMIN3
description: Basis respiration of phyto 3 near 0°

name: RXTOPT1
description: Basis respiration of phyto 1 near optimum

name: RXTOPT2
description: Basis respiration of phyto 2 near optimum

name: RXTOPT3
description: Basis respiration of phyto 3 near optimum

name: TOPTX1
description: Optimum photosynthesis temperature for phyto 1

name: TOPTX2
description: Optimum photosynthesis temperature for phyto 2

name: TOPTX3
description: Optimum photosynthesis temperature for phyto 3

name: UXZ1
description: Factor of the physiological utilisation of phyto 1 by zooplankton

name: UXZ2
description: Factor of the physiological utilisation of phyto 2 by zooplankton

name: UXZ3
description: Factor of the physiological utilisation of phyto 3 by zooplankton

name: VS1
description: Net sinking velocity of phyto 1

name: VS2
description: Net sinking velocity of phyto 2

name: VS3
description: Net sinking velocity of phyto 3

name: YX1
description: Phosphorus content of phyto 1

name: YX2
description: Phosphorus content of phyto 2

name: YX3
description: Phosphorus content of phyto 3
